acupoints.name: Neiguan
acupoints.location_hint: Inner forearm, ~3 finger-breadths above wrist crease, between tendons
acupoints.notes: Common anti-nausea/acupressure point; often used with wrist bands.

acupoints.name: Zusanli
acupoints.location_hint: Below knee, one finger breadth lateral to tibia crest

acupoints.name: Gongsun
acupoints.location_hint: Medial foot, distal to base of 1st metatarsal
acupoints.notes: Often paired with PC6 for stomach/epigastric issues.

acupoints.name: Hegu
acupoints.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
acupoints.notes: General pain/regulation point; avoid in pregnancy.

acupoints.name: Taichong
acupoints.location_hint: Dorsum of foot between 1st and 2nd metatarsals
acupoints.notes: Moves Liver qi; used for nausea with stress component.

disclaimer: For educational reference only. Not medical advice or a substitute for professional care.
